Q_DESC: Write a C++ program to change the sign of a given data object by overloading unary operator-
TESTCASE_1:
10 20
8 20
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
object 1 display=10 20
object 2 display=8 20
object 1 display=-10 -20
object 2 display=-8 -20
TESTCASE_2:
-10 -20
-8 20
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
object 1 display=-10 -20
object 2 display=-8 20
object 1 display=10 20
object 2 display=8 -20
